title: 2020 Elections, Trade & Miami Democratic Debate
itunes:title: 2020 Elections, Trade & Miami Democratic Debate
description:
Guests include Raul Alvillar, Democratic Strategist and former national political director for the Democratic National Committee, Lauren Claffey, Republican Strategist, Managing Director at Hamilton Place Strategies, and Tom Perez, Chairman of the Democratic National Committee. They discussed 2020 campaign's, the democratic debate in Miami, and trade.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
